mapper.update: update dcdg_order_statistic_base set DAY_DATE = #{dayDate,jdbcType=DATE}, DAY_WEEK = #{dayWeek,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DAY_MONTH = #{dayMonth,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DAY_YEAR = #{dayYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DAY_COUNT = #{dayCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DAY_MONEY = #{dayMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DAY_POINT = #{dayPoint,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DAY_COMSUMER = #{dayComsumer,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=CHAR}, SHOP_NAME = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_PROMOTION = #{isPromotion,jdbcType=TINYINT} where DAY_ID = #{dayId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select DAY_ID, DAY_DATE, DAY_WEEK, DAY_MONTH, DAY_YEAR, DAY_COUNT, DAY_MONEY, DAY_POINT, DAY_COMSUMER, SHOP_ID, SHOP_NAME, IS_PROMOTION from dcdg_order_statistic_base where DAY_ID = #{dayId,jdbcType=CHAR}
select DAY_ID, DAY_DATE, DAY_WEEK, DAY_MONTH, DAY_YEAR, DAY_COUNT, DAY_MONEY, DAY_POINT, DAY_COMSUMER, SHOP_ID, SHOP_NAME, IS_PROMOTION from dcdg_order_statistic_base
